title: Opening up speech archives to researchers through speech-to-text technology
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Through conferences, website, journal articles, blog posts, conference papers Education,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections Cultural
findingsText: Importance and viability of speech-to-text technologies in opening up audio-visual archival content to different research disiplines Through pilot projects development with research communities and IT developers Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections
